channel.title: Saas UI
channel.description: Advanced UI components for SaaS products.

item.title: New Better Auth authentication integration
item.description: A new authentication provider for our Next.js starter kit with better defaults and more customization options.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Building a Modern SaaS Dashboard with Saas UI and Next.js App Router
item.description: Dashboards are essential for every SaaS app, and UI libraries do help you build them fast. Let's look at how Saas UI can help.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Building a multi-tenant B2B SaaS with Vite, Tanstack React Router and Query - Part 1: The boilerplate
item.description: In this article, we'll start building a multi-tenant B2B SaaS using Vite, Tanstack React Router, React Query, Chakra UI and Saas UI.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Introducing 4 new Open Source data visualization components for Chakra UI.
item.description: Build beautiful metrics dashboards faster with Area, Bar, Line and Sparkline charts for Chakra UI.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Introducing the new Glass theme for Chakra UI
item.description: Today I'm happy to announce that the new Glass theme for Chakra UI I've been working on is now available for download.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Introducing Kanban primitives
item.description: Build interactive Kanban boards with Saas UI Pro
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Say hello to Saas UI
item.description: I'm proud to introduce you to Saas UI, an advanced component library built on top of Chakra UI.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Next.js createPage helper with loader pattern
item.description: This Next.js pattern I've been using just got a whole lot better.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Saas UI 2.0 is out!
item.description: After a lot of hard work we are proud to announce the release of Saas UI 2.0!
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Saas UI v2.4 is here!
item.description: We got some nifty new components and improvements for you in this release.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)
